activities:
Marketing Data, Business Data and Human Resources Data.  

For purposes of this certification, Marketing Data means personal information of American customers, prospective American customers and former American customers that is sent from Europe to BMW NA for processing or for sales and marketing purposes. 

Business Data means the name, job title, business address, business telephone number, business e-mail address, the image or personal contact information of a European BMW Group employees, consultants or vendors that is transmitted to or accessed via a BMW Group network, system or application for processing. 

Human Resources Data is personal information about employees, prospective employees and former employees of a European BMW Group entity; as well as their dependents and beneficiaries, that is transmitted to, or accessed via a BMW NA or BMW Group network, system or application for processing.
contacttitle1: Data Privacy Protection Manager - Americas Region
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

personaldata: Business Personal Data and HR Data as described in "Activities" above
